H1.text: who played the king in the ten commandments. Vincent Price

H2.text: who played the king in the ten commandments. James Mason

H3.text: who played the king in the ten commandments. Yul Brynner

A4.text: In 1956, Brynner received the National Board of Review Award for Best Actor for his portrayals of Rameses II in the Cecil B. DeMille epic The Ten Commandments

A5.text: Cecil B. de Mille hired Brynner for The Ten Commandments (1956) to play Ramesses II opposite Charlton Heston after seeing him in the stage version of The King and I
